Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mousy \Mous"y\ (mouz"[y^]), a. Infested with mice; smelling of mice. [1913 Webster]

mousy adj 1: timid and ineffectual [syn: {mousey}] 2: having a drab pale brown color resembling a mouse; "a mousy grownish-gray color"; "mouse-colored hair"; "a mouselike rodent" [syn: {mouse-colored}, {mouselike}] [also: {mousiest}, {mousier}]
